Potential NPE when debug is enabled
DIGESTER-122


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/digester/trunk@728881 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

file.patch:
@@ -53,6 +53,9 @@ IMPROVEMENTS FROM PREVIOUS RELEASE
  * [DIGESTER-111] Null arguments to all Digester#parse() methods now an
                   IllegalArgumentException.
 
+ * [DIGESTER-122] Potential NullPointerException if debug is enabled in
+                  Digester#resolveEntity()
+
 DEPRECATIONS
 ============
 None

message:
subclassing the module, the package reference will be lost, used the exact class to avoid NPEs

@@ -56,6 +56,9 @@ IMPROVEMENTS FROM PREVIOUS RELEASE

                   Digester#resolveEntity()

message:
Avoid an NPE in debugging messages in CallMethodRule as well.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/jakarta/commons/proper/digester/trunk@132295 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

no reason to throw an hard to interpret NPE late, better raising an exception as soon as classes cannot be load, much easier to debug - rule init and rule invocation could happen in different times
